summary: FinMate wallet app with home page, profile page, QR codes, and balance checking secured by PIN or fingerprint authentication.
known_issues: Check Balance on home page is broken and needs PIN/fingerprint auth gate

existing_features.title: Fix the 'Check Balance' quick-action button on the Home page so that tapping it triggers a PIN confirmation modal (using PinConfirmationModal) or biometric/fingerprint authentication (using the simulateBiometric helper from usePinAuth) before revealing the balance. The balance must not be visible until the user successfully authenticates.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix 'Check Balance' on home page to require PIN or fingerprint authentication before revealing balance
